title: Standup Meeting
description: Daily team standup meeting to discuss progress.

title: Register UI
description: Implement and test the registration user interface.

title: Retrospective Meeting
description: Review past sprint and discuss improvements.

title: To do list Mockup
description: Create and review the to-do list mockup.

title: Edit Mockup
description: Design the mockup for editing items.

title: Review Sprint Backlog
description: Go through and prioritize the sprint backlog items.

title: Prepare Deployment
description: Prepare and verify the application for deployment.

title: User Feedback Analysis
description: Analyze the feedback received from users.
